mission: "Helping Children/Adults to Help Themselves." Project Annie provides quality, affordable childcare and early education that empowers families in the Frenchtown community to pursue their goals while ensuring their children receive the care and development they deserve.
vision: A thriving Frenchtown where every family has access to quality childcare, every child has the foundation for success, and our community grows stronger through mutual support and shared purpose.

values.title: Compassion
values.description: We treat every child and family with love, dignity, and respect.

values.title: Community
values.description: We believe in the power of neighbors helping neighbors.

values.title: Education
values.description: We invest in early learning to build stronger futures.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for quality in everything we do.
